node.title: Police searching for hit-and-run driver who seriously injured elderly man in Palmerston North
node.description: "It appears that the driver of the car deliberately hit the elderly male and left the scene."
node.content: ["Police are searching for the driver of a hit-and-run vehicle who seriously injured a man in Palmerston North.", "They say the 67-year-old man was crossing the road on Grey St just before 12:30pm on Sunday when it's believed he became involved in a \"verbal altercation\" with a motorist driving a black Ford Territory, registration ETS464.", "\"Police enquiries are continuing but it appears that the driver of the car deliberately hit the elderly male and left the scene,\" a spokesperson says.", "The 67-year-old was taken to Palmerston North Hospital with serious injuries. The car was later found unattended in Rangitikei St.", "Anyone with information is urged to contact police on 105 or call Crime Stoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111, referring to job number P049004525."]
